site_name: Ground Floor, 19 Drayson Mews, LONDON, W8 4LY
description: Variation of condition No. 2 (compliance with approved drawings), 5 (submission of roof terrace screens details) and 6 (screens to be installed prior to use of front upper storey terrace area commences) of planning permission ref. PP/22/03537 (Alterations to fenestration, erection of mansard roof extension, installation of lead dormers with sash windows, and two roof lights) for changes to design of front door and garage doors, including glazing and colour; for the approval of details originally sought by condition  No. 5 (privacy panels) and for the wording of condition No. 6 to be altered so as to ensure the installation of the privacy panels post occupation.
